com.ngeen.asset

Class AssetFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ngeen.asset.AssetFactory

  • public class AssetFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This method has all the necessary assets to a game. It can hold types like _Types = { { "png", "jpg", "jpeg", "gif" }, { "pack", "atlas" }, { "fnt" }, { "wav", "ogg", "mp3" }, { "wav", "ogg", "mp3" }, { "vert" } } In order to load all files in all folders located at the data folder, relative to your project classpath, use the function scoutFiles Usualy, files are loaded when the scene loads, searching for the folder with the name of your scene. If you do wish to load files on your own, use finish() to do synchronous loading(call it and the loading will be done when the function returns, or asynchronous loading with the function done() (call it multiple times, returns true if loading is finished).
    Author:
    Dragos

      • _Folders

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> _Folders
        Map from Stage Name Folder(Ex. LoadStage, GameStage, etc.) in data to All the files in it. The string also has an index number to follow it, representing the Types it holds. Ex LoadStage0, LoadStage1..

      • checkExt

        private boolean checkExt(java.lang.String name,
                         int i)
        Check if given file is of specific given type. This is done only when specified. Will not be done in Release mode.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the file
        i - Index of _Types array of arrays.
        Returns:
        If it is of specified type or not.
